properties.ui.config.refreshCameraList.caption: Start
properties.ui.config.sectionGeneral.caption: General
properties.ui.config.p2pSerial.caption: S/N
properties.ui.config.sectionRefresh.caption: Discover new cameras
properties.ui.config.generalInfoLabel.caption:
To take full advantage of your NVR, you must fill the following fields:
 1. Login and password - the login and password defined during the first configuration of your NVR may differ from the login and password for the gateway.
 2. Serial number - enter the serial number of your NVR to display the stream in the mobile application. You can find the value on the device label (marked as S/N) or in the NVR's configuration interface. It is necessary to enable P2P integration of your NVR! You can find this option in the NVR configuration interface, under Management -> Network -> P2P.
 3. IP: optional field - enter the value of the IP address assigned to your NVR to be able to view the stream in the web interface.

properties.ui.config.section3.caption: Stream URLs configuration
properties.ui.config.sectionGeneral.caption: General
properties.ui.config.p2pSerial.caption: S/N
properties.ui.config.generalInfoLabel.caption:
To take full advantage of your camera, you must fill the following fields:
 1. Login and password - the login and password defined during the first configuration of your camera may differ from the login and password for the gateway.
 2. Serial number - enter the serial number of your camera to display the stream in the mobile application. You can find the value on the device label (marked as S/N) or in the camera's configuration interface. It is necessary to enable P2P integration of your camera! You can find this option in the camera configuration interface, under Settings -> Network -> Access Platform -> P2P.
 3. IP: optional field - enter the value of the IP address assigned to your camera to be able to view the stream in the web interface. Note, to be able to view the image in the web interface, the additional stream configuration must be changed in the camera settings from the default value of H.264 to MJPEG. Such a setting can significantly increase the amount of data downloaded by mobile devices on which you want to view the stream.

properties.ui.config.getPincodeSection.caption: Generate an authorization code
properties.ui.config.enterPincodeSectionDescription: Enter the authorization code in the field below, and then use the Save button.
properties.ui.config.authorizationCode.caption: Authorization code:
properties.ui.config.getPincodeSectionDescription.c: After clicking the button below, you will be redirected to the Tedee sign in page. If you want to allow Fibaro to access your Tedee devices, just sign in and confirm required access. After that, you will be redirected to the authorization code page. Copy the code, and paste it into the field below called authorization code, and then click the Save button.
properties.ui.config.link.caption: Generate an authorization code
properties.ui.config.connectionStatusConfigLabel.ca: To connect with Tedee, generate a new authorization code in the Advanced tab.

To take full advantage of your camera, you must fill the following fields:
 1. Login and password - the login and password defined during the first configuration of your camera may differ from the login and password for the gateway.
 2. Serial number - enter the serial number of your camera to display the stream in the mobile application. You can find the value on the device label (marked as S/N) or in the camera's configuration interface. It is necessary to enable P2P integration of your camera! You can find this option in the camera configuration interface, under Settings -> Network -> Access Platform -> P2P.
 3. IP: optional field - enter the value of the IP address assigned to your camera to be able to view the stream in the web interface.

properties.ui.config.enterPincodeSectionDescription: Type here the Pincode you obtained from Logitech Harmony Authorization page and press the Save button located at the top right side.
properties.ui.config.enterPincodeSection.caption: Enter Pincode
properties.ui.config.getPincodeSectionDescription.c: After clicking the Generate Pincode button you will be redirected to Logitech Harmony Authorization page. Please read all information carefully. Fill Email and Password then press the SIGN IN button if you would like to grant FIBARO control of selected Harmony devices. Accept button will redirect you to another page with Pin Code, which should be pasted below.
